subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: One theory considers this character a {{liushu|p|nocap=1}}: two hands ({{l|zh|寽}}) opening tiger ({{l|zh|虎}})'s fur, thus an original glyph of {{l|zh|鞹}}. (Lin Yiguang)

subSections.title: Definitions
Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|假途滅虢|暮虢朝虞|虢滅虞亡}}
